pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Get the most out of your YouTube learning experience with our flexible plans
pricing.money_back: Try TubeWise Pro risk-free. If you are not satisfied, contact us within 14 days for a full refund.
pricing.faq_1_q: How does the video limit work?
pricing.faq_1_a: On the Free plan, you can summarize up to 5 videos per month. The counter resets on the first day of each month. With the Pro plan, you have unlimited access to all features.
pricing.faq_2_q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
pricing.faq_2_a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your Pro access will remain active until the end of your billing period.
pricing.faq_3_q: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq_3_a: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. We also support PayPal for your convenience.
pricing.error_loading: Error loading pricing information. Please try again later.
